title: Orlando Capellino
text:
Orlando Capellino Arenas (born in 17 April 1958), is a Uruguayan <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach, who was most recently manager of the <a href="Dominican%20Republic%20national%20football%20team">Dominican Republic</a>.
Managerial career.
In his native <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>, Capellino managed <a href="Deportivo%20Maldonado">Deportivo Maldonado</a> and <a href="Club%20Plaza%20Colonia%20de%20Deportes">Plaza Colonia</a>.
In 2015, Capellino was appointed manager of <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Pantoja">Atlético Pantoja</a> in the <a href="Dominican%20Republic">Dominican Republic</a>. In Capellino's first season at the club, Atlético Pantoja won the <a href="2015%20Liga%20Dominicana%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol">2015 Liga Dominicana de Fútbol</a>.
In 2017, Capellino became manager of the <a href="Dominican%20Republic%20national%20football%20team">Dominican Republic</a>.
In 2022, he is currently the coach of the Colonia soccer team (department of Uruguay). Selection that will play the OFI national team tournament.
